00054 #ifndef _CTRL_ACCESS_H_
00055 #define _CTRL_ACCESS_H_
00056 
00057 #include "compiler.h"
00058 #include "conf_access.h"
00059 
00060 
00062 typedef enum
00063 {
00064   CTRL_GOOD       = PASS,     
00065   CTRL_FAIL       = FAIL,     
00066   CTRL_NO_PRESENT = FAIL + 1, 
00067   CTRL_BUSY       = FAIL + 2  
00068 } Ctrl_status;
00069 
00070 
00071 // FYI: Each Logical Unit Number (LUN) corresponds to a memory.
00072 
00073 // Check LUN defines.
00074 #ifndef LUN_0
00075   #error LUN_0 must be defined as ENABLE or DISABLE in conf_access.h
00076 #endif
00077 #ifndef LUN_1
00078   #error LUN_1 must be defined as ENABLE or DISABLE in conf_access.h
00079 #endif
00080 #ifndef LUN_2
00081   #error LUN_2 must be defined as ENABLE or DISABLE in conf_access.h
00082 #endif
00083 #ifndef LUN_3
00084   #error LUN_3 must be defined as ENABLE or DISABLE in conf_access.h
00085 #endif
00086 #ifndef LUN_4
00087   #error LUN_4 must be defined as ENABLE or DISABLE in conf_access.h
00088 #endif
00089 #ifndef LUN_5
00090   #error LUN_5 must be defined as ENABLE or DISABLE in conf_access.h
00091 #endif
00092 #ifndef LUN_6
00093   #error LUN_6 must be defined as ENABLE or DISABLE in conf_access.h
00094 #endif
00095 #ifndef LUN_7
00096   #error LUN_7 must be defined as ENABLE or DISABLE in conf_access.h
00097 #endif
00098 #ifndef LUN_USB
00099   #error LUN_USB must be defined as ENABLE or DISABLE in conf_access.h
00100 #endif
00101 
00104 
00105 #define LUN_ID_0        (0)                 
00106 #define LUN_ID_1        (LUN_ID_0 + LUN_0)
00107 #define LUN_ID_2        (LUN_ID_1 + LUN_1)
00108 #define LUN_ID_3        (LUN_ID_2 + LUN_2)
00109 #define LUN_ID_4        (LUN_ID_3 + LUN_3)
00110 #define LUN_ID_5        (LUN_ID_4 + LUN_4)
00111 #define LUN_ID_6        (LUN_ID_5 + LUN_5)
00112 #define LUN_ID_7        (LUN_ID_6 + LUN_6)
00113 #define MAX_LUN         (LUN_ID_7 + LUN_7)  
00114 #define LUN_ID_USB      (MAX_LUN)           
00115 
00116 
00117 // Check the LUN configuration in conf_access.h.
00118 #if !MAX_LUN
00119   #error No memory is active in conf_access.h
00120 #endif
00121
